Activity: Arrive at work, enjoy a cup of herbal tea, and visualize a positive and productive day.
Check work email and prioritize tasks.
Focus on improving the integration between the ticketing system and the phone support channel. Write code and test its proper operation.
Take a short break to listen to a guided meditation or practice mindfulness.
Work on integrating the phone support system with the existing hospital phone system. @EHRV-1 @ITPM-1 Topic: Existing IT system compatibility check
Lunch break. Explore a new restaurant or food truck near the hospital.
Continue improving the help desk portal, adding features such as personalized dashboards and ticket escalation options.
Test the phone channel, simulating different scenarios and ensuring that tickets are created correctly with relevant call information.
Address any bugs or issues that arise during testing.
Review the day's progress and make a list of tasks for tomorrow.
Clock out and head home, feeling accomplished and ready for the weekend.
